119a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
119a3('bum): la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
119a4('bum): nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /
119a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob skyob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob
119a6('bum): pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar
119a7('bum): gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs
119b1('bum): rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa
119b2('bum): dang bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa
119b3('bum): rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
119b4('bum): pa med pa la slob skyob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin
119b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob slom
119b6('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
119b7('bum): pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams
120a1('bum): dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin to//
120a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
120a3('bum): kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab tukyi
120a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye
120a5('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri
120a6('bum): nyid nyan thos drang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten
120a7('bum): yin no// de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang
120b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi da / lA ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bzod
120b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kro'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ni nyan zos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
120b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
120b4('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
120b5('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
120b6('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
120b7('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
121a1('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin
121a2('bum): no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
121a3('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
121a4('bum): ko'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi
121a5('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
121a6('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong
121a7('bum): pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
121b1('bum): rten yin te/ lnga dang / mi dang / lA ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid
121b2('bum): 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
121b3('bum): de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shI ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
121b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mau dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i
121b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang
121b6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di
121b7('bum): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin/
122a1('bum): no// de dag gis thog ma dang za ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
122a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dor
122a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a4('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
122a5('bum): ko'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang
122a6('bum): ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
122a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang //
122b1('bum): go mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shrI ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b2('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
122b3('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dri ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang /
122b4('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/
122b5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rkyen yin tre/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin
122b6('bum): no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
122b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan/
123a1('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
123a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtan par
123a3('bum): bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zam
123a4('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
123a5('bum): ko'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang /
123a6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos
123a7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
123b1('bum): de dag gis dbang po rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
123b2('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
123b3('bum): ko'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
123b4('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos
123b5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
123b6('bum): de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
123b7('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa
124a1('bum): rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
124a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brtan par bya ste ba de ci'i phyir
124a3('bum): zhe nA/ ko'u shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang
124a4('bum): ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi kA tshad med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
124a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms
124a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
124a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin to// lha dang / ma~M dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/
124b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
124b2('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rkyen yin no// de dag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mthar gyis
124b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lham
124b4('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
124b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
124b6('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mngon
124b7('bum): par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
125a1('bum): bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sang /
125a2('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi
125a3('bum): sgo rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
125a4('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ koru
125a5('bum): shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang /
125a6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang
125a7('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis so so
125b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
125b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen
125b3('bum): ko'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di dag ni can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
125b4('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan
125b5('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag
125b6('bum): gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sema?s
125b7('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi cen yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/
126a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
126a2('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang lA ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi
126a3('bum): ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lho dang / mi dang
126a4('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyer gnyis pa// / ko'u shi ka rigra
126a5('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam lag rgyar
126a6('bum): dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
126a7('bum): chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil sman mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir
126b1('bum): byas bu rung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du semasade'i phyir rigs kyi burab rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam brgya byin gyis
126b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko& sha~M ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
126b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston cing
126b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
126b5('bum): rang ba ran dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kau ru shi ka
126b6('bum): mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam
126b7('bum): bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog
127a1('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza'
127a2('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas
127a3('bum): mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma da'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom
127a4('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
127a5('bum): phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi
127a6('bum): 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
127a7('bum): rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i
127b1('bum): mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod/
127b2('bum): pa'i phyir/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de
127b3('bum): dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /
127b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur stir byas
127b5('bum): phu dud du byas mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol
127b6('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
127b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang
128a1('bum): bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bA dan+da dang
128a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu rud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'dzag
128a3('bum): rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi kro'u sha~M ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa
128a4('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed
128a5('bum): pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang
128a6('bum): rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas
128a7('bum): bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam brgya
128b1('bum): byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa ko ru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi du mo gang /
128b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me
128b3('bum): tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/
128b4('bum): bkur stir byed/ phu rung du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
128b5('bum): gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi kra gral te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir
128b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la
128b7('bum): nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang lha rdzas kyi
129a1('bum): na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur stir
129a2('bum): byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis
129a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
129a4('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spros
129a5('bum): dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gangakas dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dAn dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod
129a6('bum): par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhini gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang
129a7('bum): blta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi
129b1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyur dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du
129b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyin bda' dang / lArdzas
129b3('bum): kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi
129b4('bum): ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
129b5('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin par byed
129b6('bum): 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
129b7('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo//
130a1('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stospyod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong
130a2('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las/ sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun las
130a3('bum): byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyur dpag tshad phyed pa shwa stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi
130a4('bum): spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba
130a5('bum): dran dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha
130a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /
130a7('bum): yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye mo dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
130b1('bum): kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu rung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de las
130b2('bum): so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis
130b3('bum): pas ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang /
130b4('bum): bu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re
130b5('bum): res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag
130b6('bum): bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang
130b7('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs pas rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis phu
131a1('bum): dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can
131a2('bum): res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad durin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag
131a3('bum): bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'amabaskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha
131a4('bum): rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis
131a5('bum): phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin
131a6('bum): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam largyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/
131a7('bum): dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza'
131b1('bum): dang / lhams kyi gdugs dang / lhardzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi bangan dang / snga rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod
131b2('bum): bar bgyis pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
131b3('bum): las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam largyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal
131b4('bum): ba'i lhag sar lnga rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / sgra rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phyi ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs
131b5('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang /
131b6('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
131b7('bum): las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am
132a1('bum): bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na
132a2('bum): bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis
132a3('bum): mchod par bgyis pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshes
132a4('bum): ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal
132a5('bum): pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang
132a6('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil spyan sna tshogs kyis ri ma g+hor bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis// mchod
132a7('bum): par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
132b1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i sang du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpam tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha sdug bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/
132b2('bum): daskal pa'i lhag mAr rtswa rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bring ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / sgrardzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyin bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdun
132b3('bum): rang lnga rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lnga rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang /
132b4('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
132b5('bum): las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am
132b6('bum): bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spros dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phyem dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang lha rdzas
132b7('bum): kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis phu dud du bgyis mchod/
133a1('bum): par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin
133a2('bum): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te
133a3('bum): de dag la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi
133a4('bum): na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis phu dud du/
133a5('bum): bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin
133a6('bum): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis
133a7('bum): te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi phye ma dang /
133b1('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir
133b2('bum): bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du
133b3('bum): 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kro'u shrI ka mAng ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi
133b4('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / de la me tog dang
133b5('bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sol snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir
133b6('bum): bgyis phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dag pa'i
133b7('bum): chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang
134a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
134a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
134a3('bum): dang / don dum pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
134a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
134a5('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
134a6('bum): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
134a7('bum): smon pa med pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
134b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang /
134b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / las gyi rnam pa
134b3('bum): shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
134b4('bum): da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro//
134b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
134b6('bum): to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris
134b7('bum): shing glegs bam du byas te 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
135a1('bum): dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byasabakur stir byasaphu dung
135a2('bum): du byas mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ dpag tu med
135a3('bum): par 'phel lo// de'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shI ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa
135a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
135a5('bum): tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shaus rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
135a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung /
135a7('bum): ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
135b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni don dram pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus byas
135b2('bum): stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
135b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol
135b4('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang gi
135b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//
135b6('bum): shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ngab nyid stong pa'i du ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las drung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa du do// shes rabagyis
135b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136a1('bum): las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
136a2('bum): stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
136a3('bum): pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha
136a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
136a5('bum): phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
136a6('bum): phyin pa lngas byung ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// /
136a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136b1('bum): las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni so so yang
136b2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136b3('bum): las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sems can
136b4('bum): yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// ko'u shI ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
136b5('bum): ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o//
136b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni theg pa chen po'o// ko'u shi kA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bla na med
136b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du byas shing
137a1('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
137a2('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nams
137a3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba
137a4('bum): stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
137a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun
137a6('bum): dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad
137a7('bum): med pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
137b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
137b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gis
137b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid
137b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig
137b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong
137b6('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang
137b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
138a1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
138a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnam 'jig rted du
138a3('bum): chu la yu mo/ khru klus kyi nang nga nam 'ji rnyed du 'byung bar gyur ro// dbang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten
138a4('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dzag rten 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
138a5('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
138a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
138a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
138b1('bum): ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
138b2('bum): ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi
138b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam
138b4('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de sring du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du
138b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa
138b6('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i
138b7('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs
139a1('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten
139a2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
139a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
139a4('bum): 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
139a5('bum): chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i
139a6('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha/
139a7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnam
139b1('bum): dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
139b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do//
139b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
139b4('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
139b5('bum): rang tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i
139b6('bum): lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams
139b7('bum): dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
140a1('bum): dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
140a2('bum): gzung bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o// gro gra po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun
140a3('bum): chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa
140a4('bum): dang kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par
140a5('bum): mi 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
140a6('bum): pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha
140a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa
140b1('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
140b2('bum): ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus
140b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
140b4('bum): ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
140b5('bum): ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jog rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
140b6('bum): 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du
140b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
141a1('bum): par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan
141a2('bum): lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnam
141a3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
141a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar
141a5('bum): 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzung kyi sgo rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg pa'i sgo ba rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jig pa
141a6('bum): namra 'dzi rten du byung bar 'gyur ro/ so so yang dag par gi ba rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rjechen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub se sa pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du lhung
141a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
141b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
141b2('bum): chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lce'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
141b3('bum): pa 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ ko ru shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir
141b4('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nam lA ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang mtsham brdal lo snyam
141b5('bum): na de'i tshe ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis sems la kha ton gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag
141b6('bum): phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag smos shing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar
141b7('bum): mthong na'ang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
142a1('bum): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi kra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa
142a2('bum): ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ gang su'ang rung sti gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
142a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das
142a4('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142a5('bum): pa 'di la bslabs nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
142a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par
142a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
142b1('bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
142b2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
142b3('bum): sama?/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
142b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so//
142b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab
142b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de
142b7('bum): bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni reg sngags chen mo'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lte ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags
143a1('bum): so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
143a2('bum): 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
143a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la
143a4('bum): brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
143a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
143a6('bum): par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod
143a7('bum): pa yin/ tshad med pa ba ni 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i
143b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
143b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten
143b3('bum): na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig
143b4('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
143b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
143b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong
143b7('bum): ba nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
144a1('bum): yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten
144a2('bum): na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
144a3('bum): brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
144a4('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
144a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten
144a6('bum): na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
144a7('bum): 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba
144b1('bum): de bzhin nyid 'jig rte na yod pa yin/ gzhanas yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin chos kyi gnas nying 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa chos spyong/
144b2('bum): med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa
144b3('bum): yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yon/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rtenan
144b4('bum): yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144b5('bum): byin pa stong phrag brgyapa bam po brgya nyer gsum pa// / de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su
144b6('bum): yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten
144b7('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
145a1('bum): phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na
145a2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten
145a3('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten ni gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
145a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas
145a5('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
145a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa cing 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa 'jog rten na gradags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yong ba yin/
145a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
145b1('bum): yin/ ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin / dran panye bar gnag pa rnams 'jig rten
145b2('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten
145b3('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
145b4('bum): pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar gyis
145b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod
145b6('bum): pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su
145b7('bum): yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
146a1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa/
146a2('bum): yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gang ga
146a3('bum): su yod pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
146a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
146a5('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na rtsi dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do//
146a6('bum): ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
146a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
146b1('bum): pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang
146b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
146b3('bum): kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
146b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
146b5('bum): 'das pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems
146b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
146b7('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
147a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa
147a2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor
147a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
147a4('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
147a5('bum): la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi pha
147a6('bum): lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod po dang / tshad med pa rnams la
147a7('bum): spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam
147b1('bum): bar bar ba'i sgo sbyong pa'i dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spod/
147b2('bum): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang
147b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas
147b4('bum): gyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa
147b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thab sum pas pa de'ang shes rab kyi
147b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
147b7('bum): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis
148a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
148a2('bum): bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
148a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs
148a4('bum): par/ dug gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtse gcig gi bar
