179b1('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed
179b2('bum): bdag gi tshe 'di nyid dang / tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du thob par ngas bshad do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
179b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol smin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral
179b4('bum): bar bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
179b5('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de la ni bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab
179b6('bum): pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri kha ton du byed pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong
179b7('bum): mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe'ang / lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar
180a1('bum): / sgrub par sems so// chos smra ba de dag smra sgom par gyur na'ang lha'i bu de dag chos kyi rim gro de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar sgrub par sems te/ ko ru shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/
180a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
180a3('bum): bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rimi gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu rud du byed pa
180a4('bum): dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di'ang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi
180a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i tshe/ la la zhig bdag la klan ka tshol zhing glags lta bar gyur du 'ong ngo // zhes bya bar zhum pa med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
180a6('bum): kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbyang bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten 'dus pa dang / zag
180a7('bum): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas
180b1('bum): kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos drang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha mi dad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gter yin la/ rigs kyi
180b2('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'ang nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chen po
180b3('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa spyong pa
180b4('bum): nyid la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
180b5('bum): gnas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa
180b6('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la grags blta ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la grags blta ba de'ang yang
180b7('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang grags blta bar bya ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/
181a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang grags blta ba med do// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing
181a2('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ sdang bar mi 'gyur
181a3('bum): skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba
181a4('bum): 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba'am/ skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
181a5('bum): pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phyim
181a6('bum): dang rdzun bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag
181a7('bum): gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// kau 'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang
181b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang // byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
181b2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rimo gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dung du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de ni pa dang / mu dang / gnyen
181b3('bum): bshes dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis dgos par bya ba yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
181b4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rkyen du zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod
181b5('bum): pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang
181b6('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ spobs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims
181b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan
182a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin// nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
182a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
182a3('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom
182a4('bum): pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba
182a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
182a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
182a7('bum): ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po medang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs
182b1('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dbang po lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
182b2('bum): stobs lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba
182b3('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
182b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
182b5('bum): dgu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshanas med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes pa sgom pa ma
182b6('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa mi 'phrogs
182b7('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po sgom pa mi 'phrogs par
183a1('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin
183a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan gyis phyir brgol ba ji snyed byung ba la'ang
183a3('bum): chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang
183a4('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos
183a5('bum): dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur sbyor byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa
183a6('bum): dang / mchod par byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nar
183a7('bum): lnga pa// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba dar / stong gsum gyi stong chen
183b1('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dgra' ldan dang
183b2('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang
183b3('bum): kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
183b4('bum): chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar
183b5('bum): sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag
183b6('bum): pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
183b7('bum): bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs
184a1('bum): ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung srung dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang /
184a2('bum): chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
184a3('bum): dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
184a4('bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chung ba
184a5('bum): bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// ko'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
184a6('bum): rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi sku
184a7('bum): dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba
184b1('bum): dang dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris
184b2('bum): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lnga dang / ri ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi
184b3('bum): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
184b4('bum): lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub
184b5('bum): par bya ba dang / mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/ gdud pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo // ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
184b6('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshom dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha lde phan dang / tshangs
184b7('bum): pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung
185a1('bum): che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dag dang
185a2('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtsha ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul
185a3('bum): dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi sgra dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba
185a4('bum): lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang
185a5('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi tsha ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom sdung ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbyang bar
185a6('bum): byed de/ ko'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu
185a7('bum): dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang / der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod
185b1('bum): pabyed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bsnyung bar bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shika de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am
185b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
185b3('bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du tsA bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ras
185b4('bum): 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud par bya ba dang
185b5('bum): rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so//
185b6('bum): zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mtshe ma'i lce rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
185b7('bum): 'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang ka 'dir
186a1('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang
186a2('bum): 'dir chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge ba'i lha
186a3('bum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba
186a4('bum): dang / 'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung che'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnam
186a5('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba
186a6('bum): dang / 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og min gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
186a7('bum): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du gzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des
186b1('bum): 'dir ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba
186b2('bum): dang / gdud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir lhogs so// zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o//
186b3('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/ de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa
186b4('bum): dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par byas nas shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro// gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu
186b5('bum): ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang / lha mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gung du 'dong bar sems so// ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen
186b6('bum): po rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu me de'ang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu'ang gtsang sbra med
186b7('bum): pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i 'khor gyi sa'ang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo// me tog
187a1('bum): dang spos kyis gtor to// bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod gzhag go/ dar gyi lda ldi dang gos kyi bla re bre'o// sa'i phyogs de rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o// ko'u shi ka
187a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / lus yang ba dang / lus gsal ba'ang nyams su myong bar
187a3('bum): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba'ang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas nub mo nyal na'ang shes rab kyi pa
187a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos gus byas na sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// des mthong na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen
187a5('bum): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sem
187a6('bum): dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/ chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
187a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
187b1('bum): nyid dang / phyinang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
187b2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
187b3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong
187b4('bum): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
187b5('bum): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
187b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
187b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
188a1('bum): brgyad kyi chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam
188a2('bum): par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
188a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye
188a4('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi nang skyong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par
188a5('bum): phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i
188a6('bum): don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur
188a7('bum): ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don
188b1('bum): rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don nus par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
188b2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye bar thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phyi ba'ang thos
188b3('bum): par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// yang dag
188b4('bum): bar spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga po de dag gi don par bye ba'ang
188b5('bum): thos par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lum
188b6('bum): yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos por 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don
188b7('bum): rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bya ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye
189a1('bum): pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag
189a2('bum): gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes
189a3('bum): pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
189a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bya ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de
189a5('bum): ngag gi don rnam par bye ba'ang zlos par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos
189a6('bum): gyu // bya tshul gyi shing sang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpo sems dpa' chen po byung chub rlung bu grob nga mthong bar gyur ro// blan med pasang dgapa rlo
189a7('bum): pa'i byi ma mngon pa cad rgyala'ang song bar gyur // des mngon par sangs rgyas nam chos kyi 'bar lo lasor ba'ing mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa
189b1('bum): mang po chos yang dag par bgro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ning
189b2('bum): ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar bam par bya'o// zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// shir phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba zag
189b3('bum): khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te
189b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//
189b5('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
189b6('bum): rgya sa che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos
189b7('bum): ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra zos par 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs
190a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag
190a2('bum): khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te
190a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed
190a4('bum): cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang shAr gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
190a5('bum): brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sem
190a6('bum): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs
190a7('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ ro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
190b1('bum): rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya/
190b2('bum): ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ga mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
190b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis
190b4('bum): bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshoms kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi kham
190b5('bum): che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos
190b6('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra zos par 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos
190b7('bum): par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
191a1('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//
191a2('bum): steng gyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
191a3('bum): rgyas che ga mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes
191a4('bum): bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
191a5('bum): gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug
191a6('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang /
191a7('bum): mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
191b1('bum): mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pabye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /
191b2('bum): bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu
191b3('bum): dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
191b4('bum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos
191b5('bum): dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bA dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
191b6('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar
191b7('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang
192a1('bum): me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs
192a2('bum): mang pos rim thor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
192a3('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
192a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
192a5('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
192a6('bum): brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong
192a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
192b1('bum): ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba
192b2('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
192b3('bum): ngag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
192b4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi
192b5('bum): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
192b6('bum): stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
192b7('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs
193a1('bum): / rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa
193a2('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
193a3('bum): ni bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro//
193a4('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas
193a5('bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phyi
193a6('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong
193a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyuraro//
193b1('bum): de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus la yang ba'i rnams yod par 'gyur/ lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/ gos la chags pa med par 'gyur//
193b2('bum): nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur/ zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro//
193b3('bum): kro'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zas la char chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba
193b4('bum): yin/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la mi ma yin
193b5('bum): pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / gru dang
193b6('bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
193b7('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed
194a1('bum): pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang
194a2('bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang phyogs kyi
194a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
194a4('bum): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems
194a5('bum): dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mad
194a6('bum): nye bar sgrub bo// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
194a7('bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom
194b1('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / sgra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma siyin+da dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
194b2('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji skad pa dang /
194b3('bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha me yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// 'og gi
194b4('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
194b5('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
194b6('bum): ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldong dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo//
194b7('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar
195a1('bum): bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o// ko'u shi kA de
195a2('bum): ste rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung / ma bcangs/ ma bklags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na'ang / rigs
195a3('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdum
195a4('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// bu rung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
195a5('bum): 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang /
195a6('bum): kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing / de bris te me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spros dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
195a7('bum): sim snyan sna tshogs kyis rim mor byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs
195b1('bum): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams lanam 'jo bar dun papar
195b2('bum): dang / bshos dang / gzims ca dang / spyan gyi rkyen spyan dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des
195b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ nam 'tsho'i bar
195b4('bum): du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/
195b5('bum): phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha
195b6('bum): dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam
195b7('bum): du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams
196a1('bum): pa zhig kyang la las stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar
196a2('bum): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ mi rton pa'ang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/
196a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dud du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod par bgyi bar mi
196a4('bum): 'tshal ba'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim
196a5('bum): gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu rung du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196a6('bum): sku gdung de dag sdang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la sgra rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa
196a7('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa/
196b1('bum): dang / pu rung du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
196b2('bum): 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur spyir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang / bkur stir dang / phu dung dang / mchod par bgyid do/
196b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa
196b4('bum): bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na ni de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/
196b5('bum): thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/
196b6('bum): 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyang ba'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/
196b7('bum): rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang
197a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i
197a2('bum): chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrim
197a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye
197a4('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
197a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas
197a6('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
197a7('bum): yan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
197b1('bum): yin dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po meng pa'i ra ba nyid stong pa nyid che bar sgrub pa sna yin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar
197b2('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
197b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar
197b4('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas
197b5('bum): po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub
197b6('bum): pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub
197b7('bum): pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
198a1('bum): bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
198a2('bum): rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
198a3('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye
198a4('bum): bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub
198a5('bum): pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas
198a6('bum): kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma
198a7('bum): yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid
198b1('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi na stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pas yin/
198b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrur
198b3('bum): pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad
198b4('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
198b5('bum): yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtse bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dranA pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba
198b6('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag
198b7('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa
199a1('bum): ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
199a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes
199a3('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs
199a4('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
199a5('bum): yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid
199a6('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje bar sgrub pa ma yin no// zhes bya bar shes pa de
199a7('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yon no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b1('bum): phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes
199b2('bum): par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
199b3('bum): tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis
199b4('bum): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes
199b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/
199b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi
199b7('bum): gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes
200a1('bum): par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
200a2('bum): zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni ka chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
200a3('bum): 'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
200a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
200a5('bum): med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings lo gnyis su 'dod du zod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi
200a6('bum): dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la
200a7('bum): gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims
200b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod par ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du bang // de ci'i phyi skyedan/ kau tu shi ka ni 'di mar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshus khrims kyi 'arlo tu phyin pa des
200b2('bum): gnyis su meng gnyis su byar med do// kauT+wA~M shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du bang ngo // de tso'i phyir zhen/ kro'u shig do ni 'di ltar
200b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shI ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su
200b4('bum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
200b5('bum): tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med
200b6('bum): de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus
200b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//
201a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol
201a2('bum): tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis
201a3('bum): su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
201a4('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su meng de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
201a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
201a6('bum): su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de
201a7('bum): gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
201b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shig gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mthag/
201b2('bum): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' del gnyis su mang de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul
201b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa da ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shI ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
201b4('bum): mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zang // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
201b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/
201b6('bum): pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
201b7('bum): ko'u sha~M ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi
202a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
202a2('bum): de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su
202a3('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// kau'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
202a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
202a5('bum): ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la
202a6('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
202a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// / shes rab kyi pha
202b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyi shu rtsa drug pa// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
202b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
202b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
202b4('bum): 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lce'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dwer lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim grol mchis pa de dag kun kyang
202b5('bum): bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang / lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa
202b6('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to// zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
202b7('bum): bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
203a1('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
203a2('bum): ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a3('bum): phyin pa la phyag bgyis shing 'dud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
203a4('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ba ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes
203a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to// rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na tshe de gnyis las
203a6('bum): bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton
203a7('bum): bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis
203b1('bum): chags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshanam pa
203b2('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
203b3('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
203b4('bum): pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
203b5('bum): phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
203b6('bum): phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni
203b7('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis
204a1('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma
204a2('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
204a3('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
204a4('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
204a5('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
204a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
204a7('bum): ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
204b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni spros su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
204b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ chags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
204b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
204b4('bum): 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
204b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
204b6('bum): 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
204b7('bum): b.ras mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po meng pa'i stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
205a1('bum): ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
205a2('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
205a3('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
205a4('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
205a5('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma
205a6('bum): mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
205a7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
205b1('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod
205b2('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis
205b3('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni
205b4('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa skye/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams
205b5('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni mtshan
205b6('bum): ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
205b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
206a1('bum): ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med snyoms par 'jug pa
206a2('bum): rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa
206a3('bum): rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
206a4('bum): ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
206a5('bum): pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni smos su
206a6('bum): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni
206a7('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos
206b1('bum): sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sdos
206b2('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
206b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi
206b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
206b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje
206b6('bum): chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
206b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams
207a1('bum): cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
207a2('bum): 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
