207a3('bum): 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na
207a4('bum): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos sum
207a5('bum): mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa
207a6('bum): dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / spros su ma mchis pa'i chos mi bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/
207a7('bum): smos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / spos su ma mchis par thugs su chud
207b1('bum): deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang /
207b2('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / sgyu ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang /
207b3('bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu rud dang
207b4('bum): mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan
207b5('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang
207b6('bum): klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
207b7('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
208a1('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
208a2('bum): rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/
208a3('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos
208a4('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing / sangs
208a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis
208a6('bum): byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len
208a7('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
208b1('bum): de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu rung du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis
208b2('bum): phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa
208b3('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa
208b4('bum): mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin
208b5('bum): gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
208b6('bum): rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar
208b7('bum): 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi
209a1('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//
209a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum
209a3('bum): mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bskyed pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs
209a4('bum): dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshes
209a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshes
209a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi
209a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lha'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
209b1('bum): sgo nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
209b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
209b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyi spyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang
209b4('bum): gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan cing gsungs te bshad pa dang
209b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
209b6('bum): las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang
209b7('bum): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmang
210a1('bum): du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye
210a2('bum): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
210a3('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
210a4('bum): bam du bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /
210a5('bum): bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod par bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
210a6('bum): rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa
210a7('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
210b1('bum): gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni
210b2('bum): phyir mo ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub par bgyid
210b3('bum): ro// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
210b4('bum): sil sman sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dung du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad ni
210b5('bum): bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa
210b6('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
210b7('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu rud dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
211a1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/ rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing ga rgyal po rten pas
211a2('bum): sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la
211a3('bum): rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
211a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi
211a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum
211a6('bum): cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig
211a7('bum): pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin
211b1('bum): bab+hA ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/
211b2('bum): grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par
211b3('bum): bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing rmugs tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi
211b4('bum): 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das re lta/
211b5('bum): bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas
211b6('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
211b7('bum): lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po mi pogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang
212a1('bum): du gzhag pa de dang der/ mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do// mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na mi ma lakra
212a2('bum): pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so// ma bris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na ma khris pa de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
212a3('bum): rlung gis mnar bu'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur
212a4('bum): ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro re'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo// nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na
212a5('bum): ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du gzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du gzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che
212a6('bum): chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du gzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro// ha cang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang
212a7('bum): rgya sa dzug pa'i phyogs der sprul lam/ de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhog sprul
212b1('bum): gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na / des de mthong ma thag tu dus de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag
212b2('bum): dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam mig rab rib can du gyur te ka mig gi nang dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad
212b3('bum): dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi ning ngas rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang ngam
212b4('bum): lce'i nad dam / lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nang de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor
212b5('bum): bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na// de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos
212b6('bum): sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang
212b7('bum): bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de
213a1('bum): gos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na cha ba de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos le brgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du
213a2('bum): stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na cha ba de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// de dag
213a3('bum): dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na cha ba de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// cha ba de la rnyog pa mchis pa'ang nor bu rin po che chen po des
213a4('bum): 'drang sta bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
213a5('bum): 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos
213a6('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi
213a7('bum): mi rnams la'ang yod brgya byin gyis smras pa btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de
213b1('bum): ngag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa
213b2('bum): ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba'am/ dpe'am/ rgyur nye bar mi 'gro'o//
213b3('bum): de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal ba las
213b4('bum): snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
213b5('bum): phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa tham
213b6('bum): cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
213b7('bum): kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji skasnyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
214a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji skad
214a2('bum): cig brjod par bgyi sde bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod
214a3('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
214a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol
214a5('bum): tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
214a6('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a7('bum): pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
214b1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lA ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni rlung
214b2('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste phyi sgong
214b3('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji sa cig gi rjod
214b4('bum): par bgyi ste phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
214b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
214b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
214b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod // bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon
215a1('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tanas
215a2('bum): ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshar ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
215a3('bum): ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ma ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni cha ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gdung de
215a4('bum): dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
215a5('bum): yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
215a6('bum): son tan su ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi / thogs dang tha ma med pa stong banyid kyi son tanan tshad ma mchis so// de banani gshegs pa'i sdug dung de dag kyang thogs dang tha ma med pa stong pa
215a7('bum): nyid kyi sdong // bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ma ji snyed cig brjod par bgyin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tanan chad ma mchis so//
215b1('bum): shegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang do sa kyang tu spyod / bcom ldan nga basbyin stong cadar kyi 'on gang ma ga brjod pa nga
215b2('bum): da kyi son tan tshid ma mongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dedag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong panyid kyi don tan lta sri
215b3('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tanan tshar ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos ba cad stong pa nyid kyi sdong do//
215b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rang gi mngon cir stong pa nyid kyi yon tan la ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
215b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par
215b6('bum): bgyi ste/ me dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snang //
215b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan la ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
216a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
216a2('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
216a3('bum): kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yon tan
216a4('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po mer ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snad do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag
216a5('bum): pa bzhi'i yon tan la ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
216a6('bum): de dag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi
216a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sdod do//
216b1('bum): dacos ldan 'das su 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan ny+dza ji skad cig brjod par bgyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad su mchisas
216b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs de'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lha'i yon tan la ji skad cig brjod par
216b3('bum): bgyi dbang po rnams kyi yon tan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan
216b4('bum): 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan+da ji snyed rgyug brjod par bgyid/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni ched myi mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
216b5('bum): da drug kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub
216b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan+da ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do//
216b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod por bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon
217a1('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'pha/
217a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
217a3('bum): ngag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon
217a4('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig
217a5('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyi snod ngo // bcom
217a6('bum): ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tanaH ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni chung sa
217a7('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tam
217b1('bum): snaji skad cig brjod par dgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tsha ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do//
217b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par yul dgu'i yon tan ste ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sproms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yin+da tan na
217b3('bum): rang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi snong // bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sku
217b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
217b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par
217b6('bum): shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams
217b7('bum): kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do//
218a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
218a2('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste
218a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom
218a4('bum): ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku
218a5('bum): gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste
218a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni chung ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snong
218a7('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
218b1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
218b2('bum): bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
218b3('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste thams cad shes pa nyid
218b4('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshar ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi
218b5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi son tanam+b+ha dzI snyed cig brjod par bgyi sa / lom gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
218b6('bum): de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa
218b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
219a1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
219a2('bum): kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de
219a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste gzhan ma
219a4('bum): yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed
219a5('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan
219a6('bum): lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
219a7('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod
219b1('bum): ro// bcom ldan 'das rlos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi son tanas ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdug tu
219b2('bum): de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' yon tan ma ji skad cig brjod par bgyi sgra/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
219b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i sdong ngo do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi smon tan lA ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam
219b4('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bkra
219b5('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste bag chags kyi mtshar sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon
219b6('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu
219b7('bum): btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lha ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang
220a1('bum): snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad
220a2('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan
220a3('bum): 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de
220a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni
220a5('bum): mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan
220a6('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
220a7('bum): sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
220b1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'a'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
220b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snad do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'a'o// bcom ldan
220b3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos
220b4('bum): ba'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
220b5('bum): gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog go/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin
220b6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag gis byur bur gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
220b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba nid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'a'o//
221a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yongs su bsgos pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
221a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi
221a3('bum): dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
221a4('bum): lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lnga'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid
221a5('bum): kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun
221a6('bum): chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
221a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
221b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
221b2('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong po nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
221b3('bum): ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
221b4('bum): par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi
221b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
221b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba
221b7('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
222a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
222a2('bum): yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su
222a3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dog yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
222a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par
222a5('bum): 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
222a6('bum): 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzog
222a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/
222b1('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/
222b2('bum): ngal bso bo'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/ byang chub sems
222b3('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par
222b4('bum): shes pa thob nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ras sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin
222b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ glo ba mches pa'ang ma lags/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lugs te bcom ldan
222b6('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi
222b7('bum): rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro dang / bkur sti deng gaphu dung dang /
223a1('bum): mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs
223a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal
223a3('bum): zhing mchod par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
223a4('bum): bstan pa rabakyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
223a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas
223a6('bum): rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyibu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
223a7('bum): rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang
223b1('bum): dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag na chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos
223b2('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dri la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ rlung
223b3('bum): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam stong ba
223b4('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
223b5('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye
223b6('bum): shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
223b7('bum): shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i mi
224a1('bum): shes dang / byang chub kyi yan+da lan bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam pan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /
224a2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas
224a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge
224a4('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par
224a5('bum): rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
224a6('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / bag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis
224a7('bum): shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis
224b1('bum): ba dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa dang /
224b2('bum): 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de
224b3('bum): de ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shI ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
224b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
224b5('bum): par sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
224b6('bum): rten cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya'o// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gsheg
224b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa
225a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
225a2('bum): rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /
225a3('bum): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
225a4('bum): brten te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bra sa bu
225a5('bum): thob bo// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ong ba'i dus kyi
225a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dgu na/ rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tshe skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes
225a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad
225b1('bum): rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
225b2('bum): rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / dorab med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med
225b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi zla snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang
225b4('bum): du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshod du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam
225b5('bum): pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin pa 'jig rton pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/
225b6('bum): 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shika shes rab kyi
225b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lan cig phyi re 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka
226a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos
226a2('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na ring sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba
226a3('bum): ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pabam po brgya nyi shu bdun pa// / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
226a4('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod
226a5('bum): pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags pa'i dmigs pa ma mchis
226a6('bum): so// badrug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// snyoms can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//
226a7('bum): gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag tu dmigs pa mi mchis so// shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag
226b1('bum): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmigs pa
226b2('bum): ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
226b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// rtsu bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// slar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'u dmigs pam
226b4('bum): mchis so// lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// slar dmigs pa ma mchis so// ni dmig
226b5('bum): pa ma mchis so// ror dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
226b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam
226b7('bum): par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par
227a1('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par
227a2('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bar
227a3('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i
227a4('bum): tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs
227a5('bum): pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis
227a6('bum): so/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa cu dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming
227a7('bum): dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tsho bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmig pa ma mchis so//
227b1('bum): len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// srid par migs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rga shi dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
227b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
227b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
227b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chen po stong
227b5('bum): pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma
227b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigasra pa ma mchis so// thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa
227b7('bum): ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
228a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma
228a2('bum): mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//
228a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis
228a4('bum): so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//
228a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar
228a6('bum): pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
228a7('bum): smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs
228b1('bum): ba ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs
228b2('bum): ba ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so//
228b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu
228b4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs
228b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di sngar gang gis dmigs par bgyi
228b6('bum): ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
228b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs
229a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos lnga'ang ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi
229a2('bum): de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi
229a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ de sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigasalen pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs
229a4('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so// bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs
229a5('bum): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs le lo'ang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so// shes rab
229a6('bum): kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul
229a7('bum): dang 'tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
229b1('bum): rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lum mi dmigs pa'i tshus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi sregs pa'i tshul dang
229b2('bum): s+thA mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang mig gi rnam par shes pa
229b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / s+ye'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus
229b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i
229b5('bum): rnas dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
229b6('bum): ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus
229b7('bum): te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs
230a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i
230a2('bum): tshul dang me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mi
230a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang ming dang gzugs mi dmigs/
230a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi mim
230a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / phreng pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang na sha mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims
230a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
230a7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i chus dang / byi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
230b1('bum): mi migs pa'i rnal dang / stong banyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshus dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang 'dus
230b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tham med pa myong ba
230b3('bum): ning mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
230b4('bum): dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i rdul dang / mi dmigs pa stong panyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngob
230b5('bum): nyid stong pa'ing mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bokor stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran panye bar gzhag pa ba'i mi dmigs pa'i rtsal dang yang dag par rdzong
230b6('bum): ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang byang chub kyi
230b7('bum): yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang bsam gtan bani mi
231a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang rnam par thar pa brgyad
231a2('bum): me dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
231a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul
231a4('bum): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
231a5('bum): snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan
231a6('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang rang byang chub mi dmig
231a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa reshes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
231b1('bum): tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231b2('bum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub
231b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
231b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
231b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
231b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na
231b7('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can me tog sna tshogs can 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag
232a1('bum): gi thib sa la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab tu
232a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
232a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad
232a4('bum): ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun
232a5('bum): yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang /
232a6('bum): 'phreng ba dang / srol dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba ran rang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/
232a7('bum): bu rung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji sad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
232b1('bum): la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gnan la stsa la na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa
232b2('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris khyod nyid kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs
232b3('bum): ba'i sra gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sa
232b4('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
232b5('bum): zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba
232b6('bum): dang / spos dang / zug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas bkur stir byas/ phu rung
232b7('bum): du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/
233a1('bum): de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang
233a2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil sran sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs
233a3('bum): pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la sA la na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
233a4('bum): kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sra bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems
233a5('bum): can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs
233a6('bum): kar gyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
233a7('bum): bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam du byas te/ me tog dang
233b1('bum): 'greng ba dang / spos dang / phyag pa dang / bye sa dang / nabapa' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil san sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ burung
233b2('bum): du byas pa mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
233b3('bum): cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song sde bshad cing bstan
233b4('bum): ba dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang rnam par bye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas
233b5('bum): bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
233b6('bum): shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
233b7('bum): kyang ston pa ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
234a1('bum): da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
234a2('bum): par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog
234a3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las grung na med de de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsrabs shing bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
234a4('bum): bar sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
234a5('bum): shing / nyan thos kyi rig pa pa rnams cis kyang rgyun du 'grus pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo//
234a6('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
234a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bya'o//
234b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa di nyid la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' skyon meng par
234b2('bum): zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla n+ya med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
234b3('bum): rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
234b4('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang 'phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
234b5('bum): ba dan dang / sel snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dung du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas
234b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang
234b7('bum): rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// bu drang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka ngas
235a1('bum): don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di snyam ste gang zhig la
235a2('bum): bdag gis rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod par byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya snyam na/ ko'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pa/
235a3('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang mi rang lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am
235a4('bum): lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na bdag gis chos ni ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang
235a5('bum): bkur sti dang / bu dung dang / mchod pa byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// koru shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
235a6('bum): nying yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ska nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror byed/ bkur mir byed/ bu dung du byed/ mchod bar byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang
235a7('bum): bkur sti dang bu dung dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
235b1('bum): bar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / byes dang na bza' dung/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
235b2('bum): dang / bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par byab la ci smos nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
235b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang
235b4('bum): byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim zor bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang phudud
235b5('bum): du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba sna ci smos de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub
235b6('bum): sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
235b7('bum): las byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'am nyan thos kyi
236a1('bum): theg pa pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang
236a2('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud
236a3('bum): du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
236a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa'inyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
236a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu
236a6('bum): gsum mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te
236a7('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyas bsod
236b1('bum): rnams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka da pa
236b2('bum): kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs pam grog pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams rjes mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i
236b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang
236b4('bum): 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
236b5('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang 'thob pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang
236b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob
236b7('bum): pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang
237a1('bum): 'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
