237a2('bum): dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
237a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
237a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
237a5('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa'ang dang / 'dus ma byas thong ba nyid dang / maba' las 'dus bstod pa nyid dang / bobs dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba med pa spong ba'id
237a6('bum): rang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs bstod pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / jo bod/
237a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bani dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ka dbang po lnga dang /
237b1('bum): rdzobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan pa'i dang / tshad med pa bde dang
237b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i mo stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa
237b3('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
237b4('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
237b5('bum): chen po dag ste/ 'di dag ni bag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang
237b6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
237b7('bum): sems can gcig cig rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i thing gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i
238a1('bum): las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
238a2('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
238a3('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la
238a4('bum): bkod pa lta ci spos/ ko'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang
238a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa pas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du
238a6('bum): 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzas bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
238a7('bum): mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir na/ sems can
238b1('bum): gcig pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byung chub
238b2('bum): sems dpa'i las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka
238b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
238b4('bum): rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dbus me tog dang /
238b5('bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ran dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir
238b6('bum): bya ba dang / phu drung du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
238b7('bum): kyi lam la rab tu bkod par gyur na/ ko'u sha~M ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
239a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu/
239a2('bum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
239a3('bum): zhe na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par
239a4('bum): zhugs par gyur ro// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// /
239a5('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob
239a6('bum): bothob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
239a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
239b1('bum): du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgya'o// bar rdzogs par 'ang ba 'gyu ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de ga kyang ga she na/ 'di sa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
239b2('bum): byin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
239b3('bum): dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang byi nang song ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dang chen po stong pa nyid dang /
239b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
239b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
239b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
239b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'phags
240a1('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
240a2('bum): brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
240a3('bum): shes pa drug dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag
240a4('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chob ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen po dag ste/
240a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
240a6('bum): bam du byas te klog pa dang / bris pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
240a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
240b1('bum): ngo khyim bdag gi rigs che dring mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen pa ni'i ris kyi lha rnams med do// sum cu rtsa gsus kyi sgra rnams yod do// mche ma'i snga rnam pa yod/
240b2('bum): do dga' ldan gyi lnga rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshungs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
240b3('bum): tshangs lhanye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi
240b4('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lnga rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
240b5('bum): yong ngo // dge rgyal gyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
240b6('bum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha'
240b7('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi/
241a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus
241a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
241a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
241a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
241a5('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
241a6('bum): yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams
241a7('bum): yong // snyom nam yod do// byang chub kyi lan pag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa
241b1('bum): rnams sod do// gzugs med pa 'a rnas pa par 'jug pa rnam sa yod do// gnam par thar ba bcad yod do// mthar gyim gsas pa'i moms par 'jug pa dgra yod do// nam par bar sa
241b2('bum): ni rung ba di dang / mtshan sa med bdud / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi mo rnam pa yod do//
241b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chom
241b4('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dbru
241b5('bum): bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yong
241b6('bum): ro/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod ngo do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
241b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi
242a1('bum): sems can rnams lnga zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
242a2('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
242a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu gang gis shes
242a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pam grog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
242a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
242a6('bum): gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
242a7('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
242b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sesus dpa' chen po rnams byung
242b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
242b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
242b4('bum): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
242b5('bum): dang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
242b6('bum): dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
242b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
243a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
243a2('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
243a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
243a4('bum): smyon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
243a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
243a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
243a7('bum): kham du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi/
243b1('bum): ka de ni 'di ltu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram pa'i rigs che snying mtho ba
243b2('bum): rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs rje zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i ma
243b3('bum): rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
243b4('bum): tshangs lhanye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gis
243b5('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lnga rnams yod do//
243b6('bum): med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyis lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
243b7('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
244a1('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med
244a2('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
244a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang
244a4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod
244a5('bum): do 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
244a6('bum): dor ba med pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod
244a7('bum): do/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang /
244b1('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa
244b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
244b3('bum): rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
244b4('bum): smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//
244b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs
244b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
244b7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//
245a1('bum): dgra bcom pa rnamapa yod do// rang pangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
245a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shika gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lha nog gi/ ko'u shi ka song gi 'jig rten
245a3('bum): gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji skad cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de'i snyam du sems/
245a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
245a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i grags bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i
245a6('bum): phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
245a7('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i rtson med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ro//
245b1('bum): 'job go// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras buthob par gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byar ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
245b2('bum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
245b3('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
245b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko
245b5('bum): shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
245b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
245b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog sa dang /
246a1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmig
246a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
246a3('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
246a4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
246a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang
246a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
246a7('bum): brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
246b1('bum): ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pas du bris shing thog pa dang / dI ba dang / kha ton du byang 'i
246b2('bum): phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
246b3('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong
246b4('bum): rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod ngo //
246b5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yong ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sgra rnams yod do// tshangs ris k+Sh+mI lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'thor
246b6('bum): byi mA rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdung ngang ba'i lha rnams
246b7('bum): yong ngo // dge ba'i snga rnams yod ngo do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yong ngo // zad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi snga rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// cung tsho'i thanas
247a1('bum): yod do// tshad med che ba'i lnga rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lnga rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong
247a2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi
247a3('bum): lnga rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi
247a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
247a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong
247a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa di yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin
247a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid
247b1('bum): stong panyi yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyung stong panyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi nung pa rnams yod do//
247b2('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//
247b3('bum): khasam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
247b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
247b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// mam
247b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid
247b7('bum): yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//
248a1('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de
248a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyer
248a3('bum): brgyud pa// / ko'u shi ka sdong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rnams lha zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed
248a4('bum): pade dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams na
248a5('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am
248a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pam tho ba dang / klog pa dang / kha tron du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
248a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon
248b1('bum): med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bo
248b2('bum): par gyur to// yob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byar to//
248b3('bum): 'thod bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mas
248b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
248b5('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang
248b6('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
248b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
249a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang //
249a2('bum): thog ma dang za ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
249a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
249a4('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
249a5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
249a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
249a7('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
249b1('bum): brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / ming rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang moms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ma cher bstan to// koH
249b2('bum): shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pas du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan
249b3('bum): la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
249b4('bum): cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigasu me zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
249b5('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
249b6('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//
249b7('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams long ngo // chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
250a1('bum): dge ba'i sgra rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod
250a2('bum): do/ ta chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
250a3('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
250a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
250a5('bum): phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod
250a6('bum): do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang spong ba nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po song
250a7('bum): pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang
250b1('bum): tham med bsdong panyid yod do// dor ba med pastong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad spyong pa nyid yod ngo do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa'id yod de/
250b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
250b3('bum): rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yong // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
250b4('bum): yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs
250b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par yang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
250b6('bum): rang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
250b7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//
251a1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang
251a2('bum): chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi
251a3('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams long ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
251a4('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lnga zhog gi/ kro'u shi ka stong
251a5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji med pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de rje
251a6('bum): snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
251a7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ koT shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i grags pas bri ba dang / thog pa dang / kha ton du bya nga'i phyir
251b1('bum): gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ces mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kol+la shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher ba ma /
251b2('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byar
251b3('bum): to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
251b4('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/
251b5('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
251b6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag
251b7('bum): pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
252a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
252a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
252a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
252a4('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par myong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang
252a5('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bani dang / tshad
252a6('bum): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
252a7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma meng ba dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma
252b1('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa pazhi dang / so po yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dbu' bachen
252b2('bum): po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
252b3('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes
252b4('bum): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba
252b5('bum): rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
252b6('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang
252b7('bum): byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha che phan gyi lha rnams yod // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
253a1('bum): yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i
253a2('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams
253a3('bum): yong ngo // tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yong ngo //
253a4('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
253a5('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
253a6('bum): yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
253a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang spong ba nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//
253b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa spyod panyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa
253b2('bum): nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med
253b3('bum): bstong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//
253b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
253b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//
253b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//
253b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//
254a1('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
254a2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs
254a3('bum): ba rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' bas
254a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
254a5('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyams du sems/
254a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan sa
254a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i
254b1('bum): phyir gnan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko& shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te
254b2('bum): de dag la bsrangs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
254b3('bum): thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong
254b4('bum): bu'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi
254b5('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
254b6('bum): med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
254b7('bum): bar 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
255a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
255a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
255a3('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog sa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med bathong
255a4('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
255a5('bum): dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
255a6('bum): rang dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan
255a7('bum): ba'i dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
255b1('bum): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
255b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
255b3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang
255b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan la byin na/ de bas
255b5('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
255b6('bum): de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ldanam
255b7('bum): yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga
256a1('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi rdza
256a2('bum): rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
256a3('bum): yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//
256a4('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//
256a5('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
256a6('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sku rnams yong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
256a7('bum): tu byin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong //
256b1('bum): nang stong ba'id yod do// bye stong pa nyid yod do// byi nang mang pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pastod pa'i dayod do//
256b2('bum): 'dus bya ba stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa
256b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//
256b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yod do// yang
256b5('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'ja
256b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
256b7('bum): pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
257a1('bum): med pa dang / ston pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin
257a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
257a3('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid
257a4('bum): yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig
257a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnam yong ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin
257a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa yod do// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
257a7('bum): bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ koT shika/
257b1('bum): de jis pa du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
257b2('bum): ba mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pa mthog
257b3('bum): ba dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi kA de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
257b4('bum): pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
257b5('bum): 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lam cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
257b6('bum): bo thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
257b7('bum): ro/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
258a1('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par+yA to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
258a2('bum): so/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
258a3('bum): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
258a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
258a5('bum): bstong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
258a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos
258a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang
258b1('bum): rtsa 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / spobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba dang / 'bags pa'i bden pa pa
258b2('bum): dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar rjes gnas par mams par 'jug pa dgra dang / rnam par thar pa'i ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
258b3('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo/ thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
258b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
258b5('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bskrun to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
258b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam du bris shing grog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//
258b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
259a1('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yong ngo // bum cu rtsa
259a2('bum): gsum kyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//
259a3('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i snga rnams
259a4('bum): yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i
259a5('bum): lha rnams yong ngo // tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge sus kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams song ngo // chung che'i sgra rnams yod do// tshad med
259a6('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i bla rnams yod do//
259a7('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' las skye mched kyi lha rnams
259b1('bum): yod do// cung bar med pa'i skye mched gyi lha rnamapa yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes meng min skye mched kyi sgra rnam pa yong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
259b2('bum): rnab khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes pa
259b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong ba
259b4('bum): yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid yod do//
259b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi
259b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
259b7('bum): nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do//
260a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams
260a2('bum): yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
260a3('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
260a4('bum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//
260a5('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams phod do// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
260a6('bum): bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//
260a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yong ngo // rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260b1('bum): rkyen po rnams song ngo // de ba'in bgegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko shi ka 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyu rogazhig/
260b2('bum): ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang
260b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
260b4('bum): rnams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
260b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang
260b6('bum): du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am/
260b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par jug par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
261a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
261a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rdzas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob
261a3('bum): bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur
261a4('bum): ro/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
261a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
261a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
261a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
261b1('bum): mabyas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang / chos thams cad
261b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
261b3('bum): nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
261b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i
261b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
261b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
261b7('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
261'a1('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i
261'a2('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
261'a3('bum): yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lhan
261'a4('bum): yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
261'a5('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lda rnam
261'a6('bum): yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yongad ngo // kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med
261'a7('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod de/
261'b1('bum): mi re ba'i sgra rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nos snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi snga rnams yod do// nas
261'b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes mer 'du shes
261'b3('bum): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus
261'b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
261'b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid song ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
261'b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
261'b7('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong
262a1('bum): pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
262a2('bum): rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod ngo // 'phags pa'i
262a3('bum): bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//
262a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod
262a5('bum): do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa
262a6('bum): rnams yod do// ming rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
262a7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//
262b1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
262b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka gling
262b3('bum): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las
262b4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du
262b5('bum): sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo
262b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i thugs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang /
262b7('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos
263a1('bum): rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go
263a2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
263a3('bum): bothob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
263a4('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyab kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
263a5('bum): chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
263a6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang
263a7('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
263b1('bum): rgya pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi spong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
263b2('bum): nyi dang
263b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
263b4('bum): ti dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
263b5('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
263b6('bum): ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bdan
263b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
263b8('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
264a1('bum): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / seng rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag
264a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// koT shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa 'a
264a3('bum): glegs bam du zos shing klog pa dang / thi ba dang / bton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir nan
264a4('bum): kol+la shi ka de nI 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yong pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che ning
264a5('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sod do// rgyal chen pa ni'i rigs kyi snga rnams yod do// sum rgya rtsa gsus kyi sgra rnams yod do// mu na ma'i
264a6('bum): lha rnams yod do// dgra' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams song ngo // gtan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnamapa yong ngo // rngas rnaMs kyi lha rnams sod do//
264a7('bum): ngas rgya'i phan gyi sgra rnams med do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ming ngo // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams song ngo // sdang ba'i lha rnams song ngo // rlung sdang gi lhanams
264b1('bum): sod do// tshad med sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i sgra rnams yod do// tshad me dge ba'i lha rnams
264b2('bum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
264b3('bum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // 'og min gyi lnga rnams yod do// nam
264b4('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med
264b5('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sgra rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
264b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
264b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus pa byas
265a1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
265a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod
265a3('bum): dodango bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
265a4('bum): pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
265a5('bum): rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas
265a6('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
265a7('bum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// /
265b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod
265b2('bum): ro rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba nam
265b3('bum): yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//
265b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya
265b5('bum): nyer dgu pa// / ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi stong nyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
265b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
265b7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang
266a1('bum): ngo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pa ma klog
266a2('bum): pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag
266a3('bum): pa med pa'i chos rnab rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslangs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur ro// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
266a4('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
266a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas
266a6('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
