266a7('bum): par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
266b1('bum): 'chang rgyu'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// koT shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang nen/ 'dis ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshu
266b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
266b3('bum): tubyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong ba
266b4('bum): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
266b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
266b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
266b7('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
267a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
267a2('bum): pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
267a3('bum): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas
267a4('bum): gyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam du bris
267a5('bum): shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni
267a6('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnam
267a7('bum): yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams
267b1('bum): sod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye bar
267b2('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshang med snang
267b3('bum): ba'i sgra rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lnga rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i sgra rnams yod do// dge
267b4('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnamapa yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // chung che'i lha rnams yod // tshang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mche ba'i lha rnams
267b5('bum): yong ngo // mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi sgra rnams yod do// nam mkhar mtha'
267b6('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod ngo do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
267b7('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
268a1('bum): yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// byi nang
268a2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
268a3('bum): nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod de/
268a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
268a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams
268a6('bum): yong ngo // skyobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsas
268a7('bum): gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
268b1('bum): sa/ / 'a ma/ pa / ma sa
268b2('bum): ya mag rnams pa // 'jigs parnam la / su la la /
268b3('bum): / sangs byas sa su ma 'dres pa rnams yod de/ rgyan du rnags pa'i 'bras bu bang de/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras pa yongad do// byer ma 'ang ba'i 'bras sa
268b4('bum): pa 'a me nga / byang chub med // las kyi nus pa gas papa spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tha~Md yod do// can rdzas pa
268b5('bum): sa brji 'a / mi bya rnams med // dan banas pa rnam yo / ra ma ma thas mam ldadad// nga pa
268b6('bum): / ma ba ga sa su sa /
268b7('bum): sa 'bring po'i semamasasarnams sa dos gi kau'u shi ga slong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyimams can dza mang pa de dag ribs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi thams sa
269a1('bum): / bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka/
269a2('bum): de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
269a3('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pam klog pa
269a4('bum): dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir na na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
269a5('bum): las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug
269a6('bum): go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
269a7('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
269b1('bum): ro/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub pa
269b2('bum): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
269b3('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
269b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
269b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
269b6('bum): dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
269b7('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
270a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
270a2('bum): dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
270a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
270a4('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzud kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
270a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gnan
270a6('bum): dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang /
270a7('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'bel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
270b1('bum): las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che ning mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
270b2('bum): yod ngo do// rgyal chen pana'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i sgra rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i sgra rnams yong
270b3('bum): ngo gdun 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs sgra se phan gyi sgra rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// nasu chen
270b4('bum): snga rnams yod ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshang meng snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i sku rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//
270b5('bum): rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnam
270b6('bum): yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
270b7('bum): yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi
271a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
271a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid
271a3('bum): yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
271a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stod pa
271a5('bum): nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ngo do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med
271a6('bum): bstong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
271a7('bum): yod ngo do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod ngo do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
271b1('bum): yong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yong ngo // bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//
271b2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
271b3('bum): yong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi
271b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
271b5('bum): bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid phod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
271b6('bum): nga yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra
271b7('bum): bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
272a1('bum): yod do// ko'u shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
272a2('bum): mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kol+la shi ka de ji

272b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi spong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas spong
272b7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
273a1('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
273a2('bum): sbyong ba nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
273a3('bum): stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
273a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
273a5('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
273a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
273a7('bum): gnan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang /
273b1('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kol+la shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
273b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
273b3('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yor ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
273b4('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye ban
273b5('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// cung snang gi lha rnams sor //
273b6('bum): med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//
273b7('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnam/
274a1('bum): yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
274a2('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'dra
274a3('bum): shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
274a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
274a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa'i yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
274a6('bum): nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos bas
274a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
274b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sor // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par song ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams song ngo // dbang po
274b2('bum): rnams yod ngo do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ngo //
274b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod ngo // tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
274b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i mo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting
274b5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams song ngo // mi 'jig pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
274b6('bum): yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
274b7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yong // rang byang chub yod ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//
275a1('bum): rgyan du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
275a2('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
275a3('bum): ko'u shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji skad pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la lus bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa
275a4('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
275a5('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
275a6('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam grog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang
275a7('bum): du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kol+la shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te ga de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am
275b1('bum): byas byas po dgas dag pa'i byon pa dbyar rnags pagyu to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du drugs pa'i 'bras pa thob pa gyur to// 'thob bo// yob par
275b2('bum): yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// khyer mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur //
275b3('bum): dgra bcom panyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur mo/
275b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan mang ba yang
275b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang na'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur ro// kor+ya shi ka
275b6('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
275b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang //
276a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
276a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
276a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
276a4('bum): gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam pan
276a5('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
276a6('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
276a7('bum): 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
276b1('bum): soms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chang med pa gnan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko& shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi rol
276b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di glegs pas du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
276b3('bum): nen ko'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams song ngo // bram ze
276b4('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod ngo // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//
276b5('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnams yong ngo // tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yong
276b6('bum): ro tshangs ldan phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i sgra rnams yod do// rlung snang gi sa
276b7('bum): rnams yong ngo // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i
277a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
277a2('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min
277a3('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
277a4('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
277a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
277a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid song ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid yod // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
277a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin spong ba nyid yod do//
277b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa'i yod do//
277b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams
277b3('bum): yong ngo ro// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gang
277b4('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
277b5('bum): ba dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
277b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po
277b7('bum): yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
278a1('bum): do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//
278a2('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
278a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// koSh+ma shi ka nub phyogs
278a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang
278a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'amu/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
278a6('bum): mang du 'brel las// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
278a7('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pas klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan sa byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na
278b1('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
278b2('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir
278b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa
278b4('bum): nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
278b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par
278b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i
278b7('bum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
279a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
279a2('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang
279a3('bum): za ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa
279a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran panye bar gnag pa pani dang / yang dag par spong ba
279a5('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / skyobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden
279a6('bum): ba bya'i dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa dang /
279a7('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
279b1('bum): rig pa bani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas/
279b2('bum): kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko& shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ldeg bam du
279b3('bum): bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ ko'u shi ka
279b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
279b5('bum): yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam pa yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// tshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
279b6('bum): dgang ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye phan gyi
279b7('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang
280a1('bum): ba'i sgra rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
280a2('bum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
280a3('bum): mi che ba'i sgra rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
280a4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du
280a5('bum): shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu byin pa yod do// brtson
280a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// byi stong pa nyid yod do// byi nang
280a7('bum): spong ba'i yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa'i yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // 'dus byas spong banyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong nga'ir yod do//
280b1('bum): mtha' sa pa 'das pastong pa nyid yod do// thogs dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid song ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin song banyi yod do// nos sas
280b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong ngo //
280b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid song ba nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//
280b4('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//
280b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom
280b6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams
280b7('bum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams yod do//
281a1('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
281a2('bum): rophyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid med do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa tham bcad ma khyen pa 'ing yod do//
281a3('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
281a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka byang phyogs
281a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji skad pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de ga tshad med pa bzhi dang
281a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
281a7('bum): rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka re bas kyang rigs
281b1('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glebs pa mgrog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
281b2('bum): longade ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zab pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bsrubs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/
281b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'gas par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig
281b4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob
281b5('bum): bor 'thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems
281b6('bum): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
281b7('bum): rgya'o/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
282a1('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha yomal tu phyin pa dang
282a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag/
282a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
282a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
282a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba ni rang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
282a6('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ba'izhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra dang / rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
282a7('bum): dang rta mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
282b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
282b2('bum): chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog
282b3('bum): ba dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ koT shri ka de ni 'di ltar shes
282b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim
282b5('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod // mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga'
282b6('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams song ngo // tshangs ris kyi snga rnams yod do// tshangs ldan phan gyi lha rnams yod do//
282b7('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
283a1('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lnga rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
283a2('bum): yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha
283a3('bum): rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam
283a4('bum): ges batha' las rtse mchen gyi sgyu rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnam pa yod do// 'du shes me 'du shes med yin byemached kyi sa rnam pa med do//
283a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya sum cu pa// / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i
283a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong
283a7('bum): pa nyid yod do// byi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
283b1('bum): myong ba'ang spyod do// mda'angs 'das pa stong pa'i yod do// thog sa dang tham med bsong pacar med do// dor ba med brjod pa'ing yod do// rang bzhin song ba'ir yod do// chom thams cang
283b2('bum): stong panyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po
283b3('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do//
283b4('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
283b5('bum): nang med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams song do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa dgu spyong // rnam pa
283b6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi rnams yod do// de bzhin
283b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//
284a1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub
284a2('bum): yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi
284a3('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
284a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko ru shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can jim
284a5('bum): pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad med pa bani dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes
284a6('bum): pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan
284a7('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
284b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhanas byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ni 'di sbyar shes
284b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bsrabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//
284b3('bum): 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//
284b4('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
284b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
284b6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
284b7('bum): so/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin
285a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
285a2('bum): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
285a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byab stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa'i dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
285a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
285a5('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
285a6('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
285a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
285b1('bum): kyo sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
285b2('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs
285b3('bum): res kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i
285b4('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas
285b5('bum): rgyal rigs che ning mtho ba rnams sod ngo // bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do//
285b6('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//
285b7('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnam yod do//
286a1('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // kun snang dang ba'i sku rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams
286a2('bum): yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod ngo // che ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung che'i lha rnams yod do// nad med che ba'i lha rnams phod do//
286a3('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i sgra rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
286a4('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas snga mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snga rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mchod kyi
286a5('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod
286a6('bum): bya'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod
286a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas
286b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod
286b2('bum): ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
286b3('bum): yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
286b4('bum): ba rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
286b5('bum): rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugapa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// ma
286b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge
286b7('bum): 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// sring
287a1('bum): rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi
287a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun
287a3('bum): du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
287a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka shar
287a5('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med
287a6('bum): ba bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dzugs pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko 'uru shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
287a7('bum): bu mo deng bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa koT
287b1('bum): shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la gyir na
287b2('bum): bsod nams rjes mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya ner bstan te/ de dag la bsgrub
287b3('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par 'gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/
287b4('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo//
287b5('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par 'gyur te// 'thob bo/
287b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med
287b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa
288a1('bum): med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
288a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
288a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg ma
288a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa
288a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
288a6('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
288a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting
288b1('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'as
288b2('bum): babaco brgyad dang khyams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya nar bstan to//
288b3('bum): shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang 'bri ba dang ka kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
288b4('bum): la byin na/ de bas 'da'o bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'o phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher
288b5('bum): bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
288b6('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod de/
288b7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod ngo // tshangs chen gyi wa
289a1('bum): rnams yong ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha
289a2('bum): rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med re
289a3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnam/
289a4('bum): yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi
289a5('bum): nams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
289a6('bum): pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod
289a7('bum): do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong
289b1('bum): pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod ngo do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//
289b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid spong ba nyid yod ngo //
289b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams
289b4('bum): yod ngo // stobs rnams yong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sod ngo do//
289b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas
289b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//
289b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgra rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag/
290a1('bum): par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po sod // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong ngo do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan
290a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
290a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams
