290a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/
290a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i chus mang du 'phel la ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis/
290b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gleg pa ma klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
290b2('bum): byin na// bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ke don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la
290b3('bum): bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i rkyen med par zhugs par 'gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
290b4('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
290b5('bum): bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
290b6('bum): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug gi/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa
290b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
291a1('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
291a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ga bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang ga phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid
291a3('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ga chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ga 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
291a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang gathog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang ka rang gi mtshan nyid
291a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
291a6('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
291a7('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang ga rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
291b1('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes badrug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgra thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
291b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dag
291b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs pam
291b4('bum): du bris shing klog pa dang / za ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'da'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kiru shi ka de ni 'di ltar
291b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'angadi las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
291b6('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi
291b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams sod // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye bar gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa
292a1('bum): kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
292a2('bum): do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i phra rnams med do// tshad med dge pa'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i sgra
292a3('bum): rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams song ngo // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/
292a4('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i bla rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i bla rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha'
292a5('bum): las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
292a6('bum): byin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
292a7('bum): do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// byi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong
292b1('bum): pa nyid song ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//
292b2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang
292b3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i
292b4('bum): 'di stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do//
292b5('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan
292b6('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
292b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
293a1('bum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//
293a2('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sod ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
293a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
293a4('bum): rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
293a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
293a6('bum): ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dengag mngon par shes pa lnga la rab
293a7('bum): tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa ka bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
293b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rabs kyang rigs kyi sru'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa 'da'i glegs pas klog pa dang / thib dang / kha ton dubyabar
293b2('bum): dz+ha gzhan la byin na/ bsadA nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
293b3('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ shes kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
293b4('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyi ri mi 'ong ba'i
293b5('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob pa/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// theb par 'gyur ro// rang sas
293b6('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems
293b7('bum): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
294a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'dis
294a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
294a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don das pa stong pa nyid dang /
294a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
294a5('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
294a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
294a7('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
294b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bdan
294b2('bum): gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rjechen pa/
294b3('bum): dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chud med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kro'u shi ka rnam grang des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/
294b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams
294b5('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yong bas rdul
294b6('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod
294b7('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga' lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang
295a1('bum): byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
295a2('bum): yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams med do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // chung
295a3('bum): dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams
295a4('bum): yod ngo // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//
295a5('bum): nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnami shes mtha' phas skye mched kyi lha rnams
295a6('bum): yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod
295a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
295b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// b+hi stong pa nyid yod do// byi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod// chen po stong pa nyid
295b2('bum): yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// theg pa dang tha ma med
295b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi
295b4('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod//
295b5('bum): / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam
295b6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
295b7('bum): yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod
296a1('bum): do/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams
296a2('bum): yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
296a3('bum): bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa
296a4('bum): rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
296a5('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
296a6('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
296a7('bum): la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa/
296b1('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pas klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
296b2('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams mya cher bstan
296b3('bum): te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
296b4('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
296b5('bum): ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob pa 'gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang du po
296b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
296b7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di
297a1('bum): lha ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
297a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyi dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
297a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
297a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
297a5('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
297a6('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
297a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
297b1('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mang dres pa
297b2('bum): brgyad dang / rnams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstun to// ko shi ka nam
297b3('bum): grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ shes kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
297b4('bum): des 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad gya ner bstan te/ de dag
297b5('bum): mod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi rna rnams
297b6('bum): sod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
297b7('bum): yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
298a1('bum): yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod/
298a2('bum): do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams med do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams
298a3('bum): yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam sa pa/
298a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi/
298a5('bum): lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan
298a6('bum): kyi'i ral tu sbyin pa 'di// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// nang stong pa nyid med do// stong pa nyid yod do// rmi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med de// chen
298a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma
298b1('bum): bstong pa nyid padang / dor bamed pa stong pa nyid yang de// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod de// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med de/ rang gi mangs nyid stong panyid ya ga mi dmigs pa snang ba
298b2('bum): mod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par smra
298b3('bum): ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
298b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar
298b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin nams
298b6('bum): mdang // gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams spong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams sod do// so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams yod de// snying rje chen po 'a
298b7('bum): / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra
299a1('bum): bcom pa nyid 'ang/ rang byang chub med do// ral gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid po dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod pa
299a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299a3('bum): po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
299a4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
299a5('bum): bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/
299a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
299a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka de ni 'di
299b1('bum): kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i spyan med par zhugs
299b2('bum): par gyur to// 'jug sa/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras buthob par gyur te// 'thab ga/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras butheb
299b3('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyi mo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// zab par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//
299b4('bum): 'thakhrig// zab par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur ro// 'thob pa// 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
299b5('bum): chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug ga/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
299b6('bum): rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
299b7('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
300a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
300a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rang
300a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/
300a4('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang //
300a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
300a6('bum): pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
300a7('bum): rang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ris ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa
300b1('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyams chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan te/ gtsug ka nasazangs
300b2('bum): nas kyang rigs kyi zungam/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'ang sngags pam du thos shing ldog pa dang / thob dang / 'dzin du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin nu/ dbus
300b3('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i byor zhe na// ko'u sha ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya rer bstan te/ de dag sod
300b4('bum): ngas rgyal rigs dri zhing mtho ba rnams yod de// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtha ba rnams yang da/ khyim bdag ga rigs che zhing mtha ba rnams yong / rgyal chen ba zhi'i rigs kyi ldan mas
300b5('bum): mdzad// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'dang // mdze ma'i lha rnams med de// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yad de// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi sna
300b6('bum): rnams med de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod de// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi grwa rnams yod de// snang ba
300b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// rlung dge'i lba/
301a1('bum): rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//
301a2('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu rje ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod /
301a3('bum): bya rom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
301a4('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
301a5('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de//
301a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// byi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid steng pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid
301a7('bum): yod ngo do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'di yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
301b1('bum): / du/
301b2('bum): snang pa / snang ba ni yong / ma pa med pa stong panyid meng // rlun pa bar ga
301b3('bum): pa nyid yod do//
301b4('bum): ma das/ 'gru ma / rnams pa // ngasams padang/ chus byi
301b5('bum): na sa ngas ban nas padang/ mag rnams da/ ma parnams / mas
301b6('bum): 'jug panas yod do// ma par thang pa duspyod // gyis panas pa'i rnams par 'dug pa dag me / rnam par bar pa ma byung ba nyid nga/ ma na ma ma pa nga /
301b7('bum): skyon du byed pa da // man ba smras pa rnas sa 'ad// nga 'di'i rnam sa pa do// gdungs kyi ma rnams 'ang/ debazhin ga shegs pa sengs thams mad/
301b8('bum): mi rigs pa rnams med do// so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams yong ngo // snying rje chen po 'a // sangs rgyas kyi chis ma 'dres pa rnams med do// rdzun du zhugs pa
302a1('bum): bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// byar mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do//
302a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi
302a3('bum): 'ong ba rnams sod ngo do// dgra bcom pa rnams sdod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin
302a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya so gcig pa/
302a5('bum): ko'u shi kA gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'an pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub
302a6('bum): par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gleng gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
302a7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni me yin no// gling chen po
302b1('bum): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
302b2('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam lnga bkod/
302b3('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//
302b4('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dradrung / tshad med pa bani dang / gzugs
302b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge
302b6('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod
302b7('bum): pas ni ma yin no// de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
303a1('bum): pa 'dzin pa drang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin
303a2('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang // tshul
303a3('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang yin pa'i blos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par
303a4('bum): byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos
303a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa drang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin//
303a6('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du
303a7('bum): yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ migonyis pa li spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'ja/
303b1('bum): dadang / zlog pa dang / rgyal bzhin du 'di la byed dang/ gnyis la spyod nga'ang ma 'ani mi gces pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa 'thos nga mang pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun num par /
303b2('bum): byed pa dang / 'drang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du mi la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ phye stong pa nyid rdul ba na du/
303b3('bum): yod la byed pa'o// gnas la stod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// byi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin
303b4('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/ stong ba nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/ chen po /
303b5('bum): pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yar/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// ga
303b6('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod
303b7('bum): pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyad pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mtha' las
304a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa 'ad tshul bzhin du yi la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
304a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spong
304a3('bum): de'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang me yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos
304a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ri gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid tshul bzhin du yad
304a5('bum): la byed pa'o// gnyis le spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/
304a6('bum): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos
304a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidadi tshul
304b1('bum): bzhin du ci la rnyed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa zlos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnas la/
304b2('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos yang dag par spyod pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa
304b3('bum): lo spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ dbang po
304b4('bum): rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ong ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
304b5('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
304b6('bum): spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// lags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyad pa'ang ma yin// mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/
304b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa blos// bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du bde
305a1('bum): la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ tshad med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis
305a2('bum): la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'i nga ma yin pa'i blos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
305a3('bum): pa ni/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam par thar pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang malan
305a4('bum): pa'i blos// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin du yo de la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin// mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam
305a5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
305a6('bum): blos/ mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin// mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
305a7('bum): byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma pir/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhir du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma 'an/
305b1('bum): gnyis pa lta spyod pa nga ma yin pa'i blos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la snang pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'angs yin par
305b2('bum): zlos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i zlos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul ban
305b3('bum): du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod po'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ ma
305b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos// thams
305b5('bum): cad shes pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//
305b6('bum): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yi de la byed pa'o// kai'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
305b7('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grang du mas rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la ga yang
306a1('bum): dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306a2('bum): ni gnyis su lta ba ma yin/ gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dbri bar ma yin/ bskon par ma yin//
306a3('bum): kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ dor bar ma yin// gnas
306a4('bum): par ma yin/ mi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/ log par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin/ mi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par
306a5('bum): ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos mayin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/
306a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston
306a7('bum): par byed cing / de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba 'am/ kun chub par byas pa'am/ bcangs pa 'am/ bklags pa 'am/
306b1('bum): tshul bzhin du med la byas pas ni ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing kun nub par byed de/
306b2('bum): 'chung zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing // de gzhan lang rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/ yang dag par ston par byed cing
306b3('bum): de'i don gtan la bab par ston par byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni shin tu mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
306b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kro'u
306b5('bum): shri ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar dor dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi ste/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
306b6('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
306b7('bum): las/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang //
307a1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang bde
307a2('bum): ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
307a3('bum): la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
307a4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bsten pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi
307a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med
307a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
307a7('bum): ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag pa
307b1('bum): nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang 'phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
307b2('bum): dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bu dung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
307b3('bum): mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / ba shad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye
307b4('bum): gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi
307b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
307b6('bum): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
307b7('bum): 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
308a1('bum): rgyas tshad ma dgrangs mang bdag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / 'a/
308a2('bum): dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sol ldan sku tshogs dang / bde ba'i 'i byung thams cad kyis rim dror byis pa dang / bkur pa'i byas pa dang / rba
308a3('bum): du byas pa dang mchod par byas pa zas/ ko'u shig gis kyi tha ya/ rigs kyi bum la la zhigags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgyu cher dam
308a4('bum): ldan/ yi ge dang ldar par rnamathas du mang brjo nga bstan pa dang / bshA bkrol zhing rnam par bye stegasal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am
308a5('bum): rigs kyi bu ma dro'i bsong nams 'di ni ches mang du 'bala'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang
308a6('bum): nga skar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
308a7('bum): man par rdzogs par nga cig mngon par rtsams pa cang rgyabar gyur/ du shig gal rnams kyi bu'am mas kyi bu ma la las
308b1('bum): byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nas 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / 'greng ba dang / spos dang / drug pa
308b2('bum): dang bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dar dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i pho byang thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang
308b3('bum): bkur sting byas pa dang / bu drung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pabs ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la
308b4('bum): rgya cher don dang ldan yig dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na rigs kyi
308b5('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bre mo de'i bsod nams 'din ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa
308b6('bum): dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
308b7('bum): par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las
309a1('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tshe'i bir du me tog
309a2('bum): dang / 'phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad
309a3('bum): thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la
309a4('bum): zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang bar shad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste
309a5('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha
309a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byom pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis//
309a7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
309b1('bum): ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shar lde'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
309b2('bum): rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me trog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kye ma dang / na bza' dang // gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
309b3('bum): bya ngan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang bde ba'i pho byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bu dungad du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/
309b4('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du ma ru brjod de bstan
309b5('bum): ba dang / ba shad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du
309b6('bum): 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
309b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogasag
310a1('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ki gal te gis kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ lho nub
310a2('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
310a3('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyam sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
310a4('bum): kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bu drung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
310a5('bum): gas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshud de bkrol zhing rnam par bya
310a6('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i byor zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol/
310a7('bum): tu phyin 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
310b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
310b2('bum): ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ses
310b3('bum): rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la ram 'tshe'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / drug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
310b4('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i pho byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/
310b5('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de
310b6('bum): bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang drag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches
310b7('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
311a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
311a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ gas kyi bu mo la las// 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin
311a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad meng grangs med pa dag la nam 'tshe 'bir du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang /
311a4('bum): ra bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang /
311a5('bum): grwa drung du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan
311a6('bum): yi go dang ldan pa rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi ra
311a7('bum): bsod nams 'din ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa
311b1('bum): dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
311b2('bum): d+hag/ man par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ kau rbu shi gas gas kyi yu ma/ rigs kyi bum la las/ steng ga kyims kyang bzhin gshegs pa dan pa
311b3('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad mang grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho bar du ma tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs pa
311b4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bu dung du byas pa dang / mchod par
311b5('bum): byas pa bas/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar
311b6('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byis na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni ches mang
311b7('bum): du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
312a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
312a2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sbyin
312a3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa
312a4('bum): tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med/
312a5('bum): par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas ni/ gang la
312a6('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing sngon la/ 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang / rab tu 'god cing
312a7('bum): rnam par 'byed la/ gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ston par byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de la dmigs pa ni 'di yin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems
312b1('bum): dpa'i dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di gtang ngo // 'di la ni sbyin pa bya'o snyam na/ des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas//
312b2('bum): sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims srung zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di sring
312b3('bum): ji snyam na/ des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas/ tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rib tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa sgom zhing
312b4('bum): 'di snyam du bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/ des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas/ bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//
312b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom zhing / 'di snyam du bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 'di'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo snyam na/ des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams
312b6('bum): bas/ brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing
312b7('bum): 'di snyam du bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par gzhag go snyam na/ des bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par
313a1('bum): bzhag pas/ bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab sgom zhing 'di snyam du/
313a2('bum): badrag nA shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam na/ des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas/ shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// ko'u
313a3('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
313a4('bum): rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
313a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
313a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na tshul
313a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyangad na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang
313b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spang na
313b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dza ltar spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro/
313b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u sha kA 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gdong ba'i tshi/ yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs/ sbyin pa dang len pa mi
313b4('bum): dmigs so// tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims dang tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba mi dmigs so// bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe bzod pa dang bzod pa bsgoms pa mi dmigs so//
313b5('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom pa'itshebartson 'grus dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams la snrums par 'jug pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan dang bsam gtan sgom
313b6('bum): ba mi dmigs so// shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ shes rab dang shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni
313b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
314a1('bum): 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shes/
314a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan
314a3('bum): bar bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par brtson
314a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya/
314a5('bum): de ltar khong du chud pa med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ltar khong du chud pa med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan// yi ge
314a6('bum): dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol
314a7('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/ der rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag gis kyang /
314b1('bum): gzugs panar nga thos nas lam stor bar 'gyur te/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ phi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o// 'a
314b2('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi
314b3('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi du yongag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snyam zhing / de dag gzugs brnyan ston par byed pa'o// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
314b4('bum): kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kai'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes
314b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brtan ston te/ de la 'din shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan de/ 'di ltar gzugs
314b6('bum): mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhe bya bar ston/ gzugs bdag med do zhe bya bar ston/ gzugs mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
314b7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la ston pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur
315a1('bum): ro// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar
315a2('bum): rtog pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
315a3('bum): byin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhe bya bar ston/ tsher ba bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ tshor ba mi sdug go
315a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor
315a5('bum): ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tsher ba mi rtag go zhes bya
315a6('bum): bar rtog pa dang // tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba ma sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
315a7('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 'du shes
315b1('bum): mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes rjod de/ sral bstan pa de dag kyang 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
315b2('bum): ro/ 'chu bas sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du shes mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar do ga/
315b3('bum): 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du shes bdag med do zhes bya ba rig pa dang / 'du shes mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
315b4('bum): bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / 'du byed bdag
315b5('bum): med do zhes bya bar ston/ 'du byed mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ srul bston pa de dag
315b6('bum): kyang 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed mi sdus
315b7('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'du byed mi dag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed bdag med do zhes
316a1('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtom pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa mi rtag go//
316a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad
316a3('bum): du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa sdug
316a4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par
316a5('bum): shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi sdug
316a6('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas dbres rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnyar la spyod par 'gyur ro// mig mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mi bdag
316a7('bum): med do zhes bya bar ston/ mig mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
316b1('bum): mig mi dag ces bya bar dog par 'gyur smra mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mig bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mig mi sdug ces bya ba jog
316b2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mag mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mig 'dag med do zhes bya bar dog pa dang mig mi sdug
316b3('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rna ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/
316b4('bum): rnab bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan
316b5('bum): pa de dag kyang rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar dog par 'gyur ro// rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna ba bdag med ces bye bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna ba me sdug ces
316b6('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltan de dag rna ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba mi
316b7('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sna mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sna sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
317a1('bum): sna bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ sna mi sdug go zhes bya bar sten cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes
317a2('bum): rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang sna mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
317a3('bum): sna mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sna mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sna sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sna bdag med
317a4('bum): do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sna mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lce mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/
317a5('bum): lce sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lce bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ lce mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
317a6('bum): pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang lce mi tig ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce bdag med ces bya
317a7('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lci mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lce sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
317b1('bum): lce bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lde mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lus mi rtag go zhes

317b5('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / lus bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lus mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
317b6('bum): yid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ yid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ yid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ yid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
317b7('bum): spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang yid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro//
318a1('bum): yid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag yid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yid sdug

318a6('bum): rtog pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
318a7('bum): byin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sgra mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sgra sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sgra bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ sgra mi sdug go zhes bya ba
318b1('bum): skyon cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang smra mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sgra sdug bsngal

318b3('bum): sgra sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sgra bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sgra mi sdug go / zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par gyu
318b4('bum): dri mI rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dri sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dI bdag med de zhes bya bar ston/ dri mo sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa

318b7('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dri mo sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ro ma tig go zhes bya bar ston/
319a1('bum): ro sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ ro bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ ro mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes kyi pha rol

319a3('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// ro mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dgra ro mi rtag ko zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ro sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ro bdag
319a4('bum): med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ri mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// reg mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston

319a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// reg mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag reg mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg sdug bsngal le zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg bdag med
319b1('bum): do zhes bya bar dog pa dang / reg mo sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chos mi rtag ga zhes bya bar sten/ chos

319b3('bum): de zhes rji de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang chos ma tog ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos bdag med ces zla bar rtog par 'gyur
319b4('bum): ro/ chos mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chos mi rdeg go zhes bya bar rdeg pa dang / chos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos 'dag med do zhes

319b6('bum): bya bar stor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar
319b7('bum): ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur te/
320a1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mig gi rnam par

320a4('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/

320a6('bum): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rig par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par
320a7('bum): 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug
320b1('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

321b1('bum): rtag ces bya bar dag par 'gyur ro// sras kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lus kyi

322a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod

322a6('bum): reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
322a7('bum): byin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med
322b1('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/ zla ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad dugang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang
322b2('bum): bu'i 'dus te dreg pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdagra med ces bya ba 'jog par 'gyur
322b3('bum): ro/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma sdug ces bya bar dog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsnga'o
322b4('bum): la zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
322b5('bum): ba'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
322b6('bum): med do zhes bya bar ston/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug gi zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
322b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag mod ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sna'i 'dus te
323a1('bum): reg pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
323a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te/
323a3('bum): reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad
323a4('bum): du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes
323a5('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug ces bya bar dog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya ba
323a6('bum): rtog pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
